spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning roughly matches (dining left, kitchen top, living right, bedroom bottom-left, service core central, stair wing right), but multiple critical layout mismatches: entrance location/door not represented (E1/E2), stair form and placement differs (spiral added; straight run differs) (E5/E2), wash area + toilet configuration does not match the 2D split and door locations (E2/E3), several interior doors appear in different positions/orientations than the plan (E2/E3), and room proportions (kitchen/hall widths and stair wing proportions) appear distorted versus the plan (E4). Window locations/counts also do not clearly correspond to the plan (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is partially preserved (major rooms remain neighbors), but key structural fidelity issues: hallucinated spiral staircase not in plan (E5) and the stair configuration in the right wing does not match the plan (E2/E4). The service core (wash area over toilet) is not faithfully separated/represented (E2/E1) and door embedding/locations between corridor/living/service rooms are inconsistent (E2/E3). No clear evidence of the main entrance door where the plan shows it (E1). Wall thickness looks generally consistent, but openings and partitioning diverge materially.

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining, living, and bedroom furniture types are broadly plausible, but mapping is not plan-faithful: bathroom includes bathtub/fixtures not indicated on the 2D plan (E5), and some furniture scale/fit (living seating cluster and circulation clearances near doors/hall) appears inconsistent with the tighter plan proportions (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong visual quality: clean geometry, coherent materials, good lighting, and clear isometric-style presentation. Minor deductions: camera/projection reads slightly perspective rather than strict orthographic isometric (E6), and some cutaway edges/openings read stylized rather than plan-accurate (E6).

detected_errors.description: Main entrance door shown on the 2D plan (top-right, 'Entrance to the House') is not clearly present/placed in the 3D render.
Spiral/curved staircase near the kitchen/living junction is hallucinated; the 2D plan shows only a straight stair run in the right wing.
Stair wing layout and stair run placement/orientation in 3D does not match the 2D stair footprint and access shown in the plan.
Wash Area and Toilet are not faithfully represented as the same split core with matching partitioning and locations as in the 2D plan.
Multiple interior door orientations/placements (between hall/service core/bedroom/living) do not match the door swings and locations indicated in the 2D plan.
Window placement/counts appear inconsistent with the 2D plan (notably dining/living/bedroom facades and service core windowing).
Room and circulation proportions appear distorted versus the 2D plan, especially kitchen footprint vs hall width and the stair wing depth/width.
Bathroom bathtub/fixture arrangement appears added; the 2D plan indicates wash area + toilet but does not depict a bathtub.
Rendering uses stylized cutaway/perspective that reduces strict orthographic/isometric plan fidelity.
